0: I was furious that representatives would promise amenities that the hotel did not even have
do not bother to try and get food at a table near the bar in the lobby
There was what sounded like a party in the hall all night
The housekeeping staff was a bit loud in the hallway during the day but it was not an issue when trying to sleep

A change in 2016 if you enter the garage without paying at the entrance special event payment of 10 bucks you will have to pay the daily fee upon exit on Sunday a change from my last 2 reviews were parking was free because the gates were up on Sunday AM
The 2nd know against Mariot is the gym
This left only 1 remaining elevator working
I spent 11 days there at a meeting and more than once I waited in line in excess of 30 minutes to board an elevator
After another 90 minutes of waiting and still no air mattress I once more went down to the lobby and insisted on speaking to the manager
I would have no problems with this hotel if they had better service and provided a few of the basic amenities you get from hotels where you can pay much less
1: Hotel facilities were excellent location in heart of the city and on water and room accommodations were very comfortable welcoming
I love the location and the lobby restaurant has a great buffet breakfast
The rooftop pool was perfect and we enjoyed time in the hotel lobby listening to singers or just having a beverage
Lobby bar was very nice with a good menu and good bourbon selections at fair prices
Mort the lobby bartender is great
The meeting facilities were well managed and supported appropriately

Halie Many and Sam each offered friendly welcoming faces each time I passed through the lobby area assisted me with arranging transportation to enjoy the area and even provided technical help with using WI Fi
Restaurants conference rooms pool and lobby are all beautiful and spacious
Lots of great equipment good music good a c
The restaurant was good the ambiance was excellent the facility itself was bright modern and clean and the wait staff valet and parking staff all very helpful
